author: gtully
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3785 - ActiveMQSslConnectionFactory does not detect ssl request in failover URIs when creating transports. factory was bypassing the protocol selection, fixed by making use of the sslcontext thread local, which is used when set by the ssltransport factory
